The Ordinary Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate Solution 20% in Vitamin F (2019 formulation)

Brand: The Ordinary

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Coconut Alkanes, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Ethyl Linoleate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Squalane.

Direction
book: 2532-The Ordinary Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate Solution 20% in Vitamin F (2019 formulat

chunk:
Squalane.

Directions: Apply a few drops to the entire face in the AM and/or PM. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Refer to our in-depth guide to patch testing.

Warnings: Keep out of reach of children.
